statements: UPDATE Investment_Risk_Models SET name = 'Aggressive', risk_score = 9.5 WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE Investment_Risk_Models SET risk_score = 4.5, description = 'High Risk Model' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Investment_Risk_Models SET description = 'Medium Risk Model', name = 'Balanced Model' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE Investment_Risk_Model SET model_description = 'Conservative approach' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Portfolio_Optimization SET risk_score = 3.75, portfolio_value = 15000.00 WHERE portfolio_name = 'Tech Portfolio';
UPDATE Investment_Risk_Model SET model_description = 'New and Improved model description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Portfolio_Optimization SET risk_score = 4.50, portfolio_name = 'Updated Portfolio Name' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE RiskModel SET model_name = 'Revised Model', description = 'Improved Risk Model' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Portfolio SET total_value = 75000.45, assets = ARRAY['Stocks', 'Bonds'] WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE RiskModel SET description = 'New risk model description', model_name = 'Model XYZ' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Portfolio SET assets = ARRAY['AAPL', 'GOOGL', 'AMZN'], total_value = 500000.00 WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE RiskMetrics SET value = 0.75 WHERE model_name = 'Model A' AND metric_name = 'Metric X';
UPDATE StockPrices SET price = 105.42 WHERE ticker = 'AAPL' AND date = '2022-01-10';
UPDATE RiskMetrics SET value = 10.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE StockPrices SET price = 150.75, ticker='AAPL' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE Risk_Models SET model_name = 'ABC Model', model_description = 'Updated description' WHERE model_id = 1;
